definition: system/to control/to regulate/variant of 製|制[zhi4]
ox/cow/bull/CL:條|条[tiao2],頭|头[tou2]/newton (abbr. for 牛頓|牛顿[niu2 dun4])/(slang) awesome
radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 13), occurring in 用, 同, 网 etc/see also 同字框[tong2 zi4 kuang4]

sentences.english: They offer score systems or membership systems to consolidate the consumption group.
sentences.chinese: 积分制，会员制不断出台稳定消费群。

sentences.english: A typical example is the oxidation of ethylbenzene to prepare acetophenone.
sentences.chinese: 其中最有代表性的是乙苯氧化制苯乙酮。

sentences.english: Yarn of cellulose acetate filaments, single, nes, not put up.
sentences.chinese: 其他单纱，醋酸纤维长丝纺制，非供零售用。

sentences.english: Using sorbitol as a substitute for polyglycerin to make an industrial deformer was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 试验了用山梨醇取代聚甘油制工业用消泡剂的可能性。

sentences.english: Methods A part of 2002-2003 7-year medical students and tutors were interviewed.
sentences.chinese: 方法召开七年制学生和导师座谈会。

sentences.english: First things first, use whole sign houses.
The whole machinery of gold exchange standard is in the formative stage.
sentences.chinese: 金汇兑本位制的整个机制正在成型阶段。

sentences.english: The choice of buying-selling exchange mechanism is important to the exchange rate.
sentences.chinese: 结售汇制的选择是一国汇率制度的重要内容。

sentences.english: Furthermore, we observed autotomy phenomenon only appeared on ipsilateral hind foot in model group.
sentences.chinese: 术后只有制模组于术侧后足出现自噬现象。
股份公司制使得大型企业成为可能。

sentences.english: Increased the range of leatherworking drums to 40 yards.
sentences.chinese: 制皮制皮的战鼓作用范围增加到40码。

sentences.english: The cash method for tax purposes is the most simplest to understand.
sentences.chinese: 为税收目的而采用收付实现制最易理解。

sentences.english: China's reform on the election system of presiding judge has been implemented for 5 years.
sentences.chinese: 我国法院系统的审判长选任制改革实施了已近五年。

sentences.english: Those who have enrolled in credit-bearing courses offered under CAM will be issued a CAM student identity card.
sentences.chinese: 学分累积制的学员将获发学生证作辨别身份之用。

sentences.english: If there are six or fewer teams, the single round-robin (one-round league) system will be adopted.
sentences.chinese: 因为本次比赛只有六个队，采用单循环制。

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)

to get rid of/to remove/to exclude/to eliminate/to wipe out/to divide/except/not including
to change over to/to switch to/to use (sth different)
course of action/method of doing sth/practice/modus operandi
to continue to use (old methods)/to apply as before/according to usage
to put in place/to put into practice/to take effect
to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works
to make more of the same thing/to reproduce/to reprocess/to remanufacture
